tool_description: Simple provider of foreign exchange rates for major currencies.
name: Exchange Rate Provider
title: Exchange Rate Provider

api_list.name: Get Foreign Exchange Rates for other major currencies
api_list.description:
Get Foreign Exchange Rates for other major currencies. At the moment only GBP and USD are available. More will be added with future updates.

So as `currencyId` please **use only** `/gbp` or `/usd`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate-provider.p.rapidapi.com/other/gbp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate-provider.p.rapidapi.com/other/{currencyid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get EUR Foreign Exchange Rates
api_list.description: Get Foreign Exchange Rates for default currency EUR.
